K10D0176_H0177:304a-19: de bzhin du dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang ji

K10D0176_H0177:304b-0: dri ma @304b med par grags pa'i rkang pa la
K10D0176_H0177:304b-1: mgo bos phyag btsal te bdud dang lhan cig slar

K10D0176_H0177:330a-2: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la nga rgyal
K10D0176_H0177:330a-5: khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
K10D0176_H0177:330a-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am /
K10D0176_H0177:330a-9: bdag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ston pas na nyan thos kyi theg pa can no //
K10D0176_H0177:330a-10: bdag ni rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas 'jug
K10D0176_H0177:330a-11: pas na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can no
K10D0176_H0177:330a-12: // bdag ni snying rje chen po mi gtong bas na theg pa chen po pa yin mod kyi /
K10D0176_H0177:330a-16: tsamba ka'i tshal du zhugs na ae randa'i dri la mi snom gyi /
K10D0176_H0177:330a-17: tsamba ka'i tshal du zhugs na tsamba ka nyid kyi dri la snom pa de bzhin du /
K10D0176_H0177:330a-19: khyim 'di na sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan dri ngad ldan pa gnas pas nyan thos dang /
K10D0176_H0177:330a-20: rang sangs rgyas kyi dri la mi snom mo //
K10D0176_H0177:330a-32: lto 'phye chen po gang dag khyim 'dir gnas pa
K10D0176_H0177:330a-33: de dag kyang skyes bu dam pa 'di'i chos thos
K10D0176_H0177:330a-34: pas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan gyi dris
K10D0176_H0177:330a-35: byang chub kyi sems bskyed de dong ngo //
K10D0176_H0177:330b-0: @330b bdag khyim 'di la lo bcu gnyis lon yang byams pa chen po dang /
K10D0176_H0177:330b-1: snying rje chen por ldan pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:330b-2: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang ldan pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /
K10D0176_H0177:330b-3: rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i gtam sngon ma thos so //
K10D0176_H0177:330b-5: khyim 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos
K10D0176_H0177:330b-6: rnam pa brgyad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par snang
K10D0176_H0177:330b-8: khyim 'di ni gser gyi kha dog gi 'od rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pas na mtshan mo'am /
K10D0176_H0177:330b-11: nyi ma'ang mi mngon mi snang ste /
K10D0176_H0177:330b-12: de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa dang po'o //
K10D0176_H0177:330b-15: gang dag khyim 'dir zhugs pa de dag zhugs ma thag tu nyon mongs pas gtse ba med de /
K10D0176_H0177:330b-16: de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gnyis pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:330b-19: khyim 'di na rtag tu brgya byin dang /
K10D0176_H0177:330b-22: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mi 'bral te /
K10D0176_H0177:330b-23: de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:330b-26: khyim 'di na rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos bsgrags pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:330b-27: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i gtam dang /
K10D0176_H0177:331a-0: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i gtam @331a *//
K10D0176_H0177:331a-2: de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bzhi pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:331a-5: khyim 'di na rtag tu lha dang /
K10D0176_H0177:331a-9: rnga de dag las sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med
K10D0176_H0177:331a-10: pa bsgrub pa'i sgra dus thams cad du 'byung ste
K10D0176_H0177:331a-11: / 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:331a-14: khyim 'di na rin po che thams cad kyis gang
K10D0176_H0177:331a-15: ba zad mi shes pa'i gter chen po bzhi yod
K10D0176_H0177:331a-16: de / de'i mthus sems can dbul zhing phongs pa thams cad kyis khyer te /
K10D0176_H0177:331a-17: dong yang zad mi shes te /
K10D0176_H0177:331a-18: de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos drug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:331a-21: khyim 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:331a-29: don thams cad grub pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:331a-32: seng ge'i sgra de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa
K10D0176_H0177:331a-33: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa rnams
K10D0176_H0177:331a-34: skyes bu dam pa 'dis bsams ma thag tu kun
K10D0176_H0177:331a-35: gshegs te / gshegs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
K10D0176_H0177:331b-0: gsang @331b ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la
K10D0176_H0177:331b-1: 'jug pa bstan nas slar gshegs te /
K10D0176_H0177:331b-2: de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bdun pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:331b-5: khyim 'di na lha thams cad kyi gnas kyi bkod pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:331b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa thams cad snang ste /
K10D0176_H0177:331b-7: de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:331b-9: khyim 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad po de dag snang ste /
K10D0176_H0177:331b-10: 'di lta bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos mthong
K10D0176_H0177:331b-11: na nyan thos kyi chos la su zhig 'dod par
K10D0176_H0177:331b-14: khyod bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur na ci nyes /
K10D0176_H0177:331b-16: bdag gi lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du bud med
K10D0176_H0177:331b-17: kyi dngos po btsal na'ang da dung ma rnyed do
K10D0176_H0177:331b-19: sgyu ma mkhan gyis bud med sprul pa de la /
K10D0176_H0177:331b-22: bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur na ci nyes zhes byas na de ji skad zer bar 'gyur /
K10D0176_H0177:331b-24: de la yang dag pa yongs su grub pa gang yang med do //
K10D0176_H0177:331b-27: de bzhin du chos thams cad yongs su ma grub pa ste /
K10D0176_H0177:331b-28: sgyu mas sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid la bud med
K10D0176_H0177:331b-29: kyi dngos po las bsgyur na ci nyes zhes khyod
K10D0176_H0177:331b-31: de nas lha mo des 'di lta bur byin gyis
K10D0176_H0177:331b-32: brlab pa byin gyis brlabs nas ji lta bur gnas
K10D0176_H0177:331b-33: brtan sh'a ri'i bu lha mo de ci 'dra ba
K10D0176_H0177:332a-2: lha mo de'ang gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu ci 'dra bar de 'dra bar snang ngo //
K10D0176_H0177:332a-3: de nas lha mo sh'a ri'i bu'i gzugs su gyur
K10D0176_H0177:332a-4: pa des sh'a ri'i bu lha mo'i gzugs su gyur
K10D0176_H0177:332a-7: bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur na ci nyes zhes dris so //
K10D0176_H0177:332a-8: sh'a ri'i bu lha mo'i gzugs su gyur pas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0176_H0177:332a-9: kho bo skyes pa'i gzugs ni mi snang bar gyur te /
K10D0176_H0177:332a-10: kho bo bud med kyi lus su gyur nas gang bsgyur mi shes so //
K10D0176_H0177:332a-12: gal te gnas brtan gyis bud med kyi gzugs las
K10D0176_H0177:332a-13: slar bsgyur nus na ni bud med thams cad kyis
K10D0176_H0177:332a-14: bud med kyi dngos po las 'gyur ro //
K10D0176_H0177:332a-15: ji ltar gnas brtan bud med du snang ba de
K10D0176_H0177:332a-16: bzhin du bud med thams cad kyang bud med gyi
K10D0176_H0177:332a-18: bud med ma yin pa las bud med kyi gzugs su snang ngo //
K10D0176_H0177:332a-19: de la dgong te bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad bud med kyang ma yin /
K10D0176_H0177:332a-20: skyes pa'ang ma yin zhes gsungs so //
K10D0176_H0177:332a-21: de nas lha mo des byin gyis brlabs de btang ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:332a-22: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu slar yang bdag gi gzugs dang ldan par gyur to //
K10D0176_H0177:332a-23: de nas lha mo des sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0176_H0177:332a-25: khyod kyis bud med kyi gzugs su byas pa de ga re /
K10D0176_H0177:332b-2: de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang byas pa'ang med /
K10D0176_H0177:332b-4: gang ma byas shing bsgyur ba med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka'o //
K10D0176_H0177:332b-6: lha mo khyod 'di nas shi 'phos na gang du skye /
K10D0176_H0177:332b-8: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa de gar skye bar bdag kyang der skye'o //
K10D0176_H0177:332b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la ni 'chi 'pho'ang med /
K10D0176_H0177:332b-13: chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te /
K10D0176_H0177:332b-14: 'chi 'pho med cing skye ba med do //
K10D0176_H0177:332b-16: lha mo khyod ji srid na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
K10D0176_H0177:332b-18: gang gi tshe gnas brtan khyod so so'i skye bo'i
K10D0176_H0177:332b-19: chos dang ldan par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag kyang
K10D0176_H0177:332b-20: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K10D0176_H0177:332b-23: kho bo so so'i skye bo'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no //
K10D0176_H0177:332b-26: de bzhin du bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs
K10D0176_H0177:332b-27: par 'tshang rgya ba de ni gnas ma yin no
K10D0176_H0177:332b-29: byang chub ni gnas ma yin pa la gnas pa'i phyir te /
K10D0176_H0177:332b-30: de lta bas na gnas ma yin pa la ni
K10D0176_H0177:332b-31: su'ang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do
K10D0176_H0177:332b-32: // gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:332b-33: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni gangg'a'i klung gi
K10D0176_H0177:332b-34: bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon
K10D0176_H0177:333a-0: par rdzogs @333a *// par sangs rgyas so //
K10D0176_H0177:333a-2: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
K10D0176_H0177:333a-7: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams zhes bya ba
K10D0176_H0177:333a-8: de ni yi ge bgrang ba'i brda'i tshig bla dvags
K10D0176_H0177:333a-9: te / sangs rgyas rnams ni 'das pa'am /
K10D0176_H0177:333a-11: da ltar byung ba ma yin te /
K10D0176_H0177:333a-12: byang chub ni dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:333a-13: gnas brtan gyis dgra bcom pa thob bam /
K10D0176_H0177:333a-15: thob pa med pa'i rgyus thob bo //
K10D0176_H0177:333a-17: de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
K10D0176_H0177:333a-18: med pa'i rgyus mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bo
K10D0176_H0177:333a-19: // de nas li tsa b'i dri ma med par
K10D0176_H0177:333a-20: grags pas tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan sh'a ri'i
K10D0176_H0177:333a-21: bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0176_H0177:333a-23: lha mo 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
K10D0176_H0177:333a-24: phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas te
K10D0176_H0177:333a-25: / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la rnam par rtse ba /
K10D0176_H0177:333a-26: smon lam las yang dag par byung ba /
K10D0176_H0177:333a-28: phyir mi ldog pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ste /
K10D0176_H0177:333a-29: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon
K10D0176_H0177:333a-30: lam gyi dbang gis ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin
K10D0176_H0177:333b-0: du gnas so // lha mo'i le'u ste @333b drug pa'o ////
K10D0176_H0177:333b-1: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas li tsa
K10D0176_H0177:333b-2: b'i dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad
K10D0176_H0177:333b-3: ces smras so // rigs kyi bu /
K10D0176_H0177:333b-4: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'gro bar song ba yin /
K10D0176_H0177:333b-7: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba ma
K10D0176_H0177:333b-8: yin par 'gro ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0176_H0177:333b-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'gro bar song ba
K10D0176_H0177:333b-11: byang chub sems dpas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba gang /
K10D0176_H0177:333b-13: gang gi tshe mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang gnod sems dang /
K10D0176_H0177:333b-15: rab tu sdang bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0176_H0177:333b-16: sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang nyon mongs pa'i
K10D0176_H0177:333b-17: rdul thams cad dang bral ba yin; dud 'gro'i 'gro
K10D0176_H0177:333b-18: bar 'gro'ang glen pa'i mun pa mun gnag dang bral
K10D0176_H0177:333b-19: ba yin / lha ma yin du 'gro bar 'gro'ang nga rgyal dang /
K10D0176_H0177:333b-22: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gro'ang bsod nams dang /
K10D0176_H0177:333b-23: ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad blangs pa yin /
K10D0176_H0177:333b-25: gzugs med pa'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang de'i 'gro ba la yang dag par 'jug pa ma yin /
K10D0176_H0177:333b-26: 'dod chags kyi 'gro bar 'gro'ang 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral ba yin /
K10D0176_H0177:334a-1: can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa yin /
K10D0176_H0177:334a-2: gti mug gi 'gro bar 'gro'ang chos thams cad la
K10D0176_H0177:334a-3: shes rab kyis nges par rtogs pa'i sems pa dang
K10D0176_H0177:334a-4: ldan pa yin / ser sna'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang lus dang /
K10D0176_H0177:334a-5: srog la mi lta bas phyi nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong ba yin /
K10D0176_H0177:334a-6: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang kha na ma
K10D0176_H0177:334a-7: tho ba cung zad la'ang 'jigs par lta zhing sbyangs
K10D0176_H0177:334a-9: yo byad bsnyungs pa thams cad la gnas pa yin /
K10D0176_H0177:334a-10: gnod sems kyi tha ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:334a-11: khong khro ba'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang shin tu gnod sems med cing byams pa la gnas pa yin /
K10D0176_H0177:334a-12: le lo'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgyun
K10D0176_H0177:334a-13: mi 'chad cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs
K10D0176_H0177:334a-14: su tshol ba la brtson pa yin /
K10D0176_H0177:334a-15: dbang po 'khrul ba'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang rang bzhin gyis
K10D0176_H0177:334a-16: snyoms par zhugs shing bsam gtan don yod pa yin
K10D0176_H0177:334a-17: / 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi 'gro bar 'gro'ang shes
K10D0176_H0177:334a-18: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gro bar song
K10D0176_H0177:334a-20: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa yin /
K10D0176_H0177:334a-22: kha gsag byed pa'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang ldem po dag
K10D0176_H0177:334a-23: la mkhas shing thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa tshar phyin
K10D0176_H0177:334b-0: pa'ang yin / nga rgyal gyi 'gro ba'ang ston la 'jig rten thams @334b cad kyi zam pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:334b-2: nyon mongs pa'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang shin tu kun nas
K10D0176_H0177:334b-3: nyon mongs pa med cing rang bzhin gyis yongs su
K10D0176_H0177:334b-4: dag pa'ang yin / bdud kyi 'gro bar 'gro'ang sangs
K10D0176_H0177:334b-5: rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring la
K10D0176_H0177:334b-7: nyan thos kyi 'gro bar 'gro'ang sems can rnams la
K10D0176_H0177:334b-8: ma thos pa'i chos thos par byed pa'ang yin; rang
K10D0176_H0177:334b-9: sangs rgyas kyi 'gro bar 'gro'ang sems can thams cad
K10D0176_H0177:334b-10: yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen
K10D0176_H0177:334b-12: dbul po'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang longs spyod zad mi shes pa'i rin po che lag na thogs pa'ang yin /
K10D0176_H0177:334b-13: dbang po nyams pa'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang gzugs bzang zhing mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa'ang yin /
K10D0176_H0177:334b-14: rigs ngan par skye ba'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang bsod nams dang /
K10D0176_H0177:334b-15: ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rab tu skye bar 'gyur ba'ang yin /
K10D0176_H0177:334b-16: nyam chung zhing mdog ngan pa gzhan pa'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang blta na sdug pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:334b-17: sred med kyi bu'i lus lta bu thob pa'ang yin /
K10D0176_H0177:334b-18: sems can thams cad lan ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:334b-19: mi bde ba'i spyod pa'ang ston la 'chi ba'i 'jigs
K10D0176_H0177:334b-20: pa las shin tu 'das shing rab tu choms pa'ang
K10D0176_H0177:334b-21: yin / longs spyod kyi 'gro bar 'gro'ang btsal ba
K10D0176_H0177:334b-22: thams cad med cing mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la
K10D0176_H0177:334b-23: so sor rtog pa mang ba'ang yin /
K10D0176_H0177:335a-2: gar thabs mang po ston kyang dben par spyod cing 'dod pa'i 'dam las brgal ba'ang yin /
K10D0176_H0177:335a-4: skye mched kyi 'gro bar 'gro'ang gzungs thob cing spobs pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'ang yin /
K10D0176_H0177:335a-5: mu stegs can gyi 'gro bar 'gro'ang mu stegs su gyur pa'ang ma yin /
K10D0176_H0177:335a-6: 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'gro bar 'gro'ang 'gro ba thams cad las phyir ldog pa'ang yin /
K10D0176_H0177:335a-7: mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'gro bar 'gro'ang 'khor ba'i rgyun kyang mi gtong ba yin te /
K10D0176_H0177:335a-9: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba ste /
K10D0176_H0177:335a-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'gro bar song ba yin no //
K10D0176_H0177:335a-11: de nas li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags
K10D0176_H0177:335a-12: pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
K10D0176_H0177:335a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin /
K10D0176_H0177:335a-17: 'jig tshogs ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs so //
K10D0176_H0177:335a-19: srid pa'i sred pa ni rigs so //
K10D0176_H0177:335a-23: phyin ci log bzhi ni rigs so; ;sgrib pa lnga ni rigs so //
K10D0176_H0177:335a-24: skye mched drug ni rigs so //
K10D0176_H0177:335a-25: rnam par shes pa la gnas pa bdun ni rigs so //
K10D0176_H0177:335a-26: log pa brgyad ni rigs so //
K10D0176_H0177:335b-0: kun nas mnar sems kyi @335b dngos po dgu ni rigs so //
K10D0176_H0177:335b-1: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu ni rigs so //
K10D0176_H0177:335b-3: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs te /
K10D0176_H0177:335b-5: mdor na lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs so //
K10D0176_H0177:335b-8: ci las bsams te de skad smra /
K10D0176_H0177:335b-11: 'dus ma byas mthong ba nges par 'jug pa la

K10D0176_H0177:340a-13: gang sems kyi mtshan nyid mtshungs pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:340a-14: byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzums kyis smras pa /

K10D0176_H0177:340a-18: bsal bar mi byed; chos thams cad mi byed mi
K10D0176_H0177:340a-19: spyod pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o
K10D0176_H0177:340a-20: // byang chub sems dpa' mig bzang gis smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:340a-22: mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis so //

K10D0176_H0177:340a-26: mtshan nyid med par mi byed do //
K10D0176_H0177:340a-28: mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba la mtshan nyid mtshungs par
K10D0176_H0177:340a-29: 'jug pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o
K10D0176_H0177:340a-30: // byang chub sems dpa' skar rgyal gyis smras pa /

K10D0176_H0177:340b-2: mtshan ma med pa la gnyis su med par rtog pa ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:340b-3: byang chub sems dpa' seng ges smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:340b-4: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:340b-5: kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te /
K10D0176_H0177:340b-6: gang gis rdo rje ltar rab tu 'bigs pa'i ye
K10D0176_H0177:340b-7: shes kyis mi 'ching mi grol ba de ni gnyis
K10D0176_H0177:340b-9: byang chub sems dpa' seng ge blo gros kyis smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:340b-10: 'di ni zag pa dang bcas pa /
K10D0176_H0177:340b-11: 'di ni zag pa med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te /
K10D0176_H0177:340b-12: gang mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thob pas zag pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:340b-13: zag pa med pa'i 'du shes su mi byed /
K10D0176_H0177:340b-14: 'du shes med par gyur pa'ang ma yin /
K10D0176_H0177:340b-15: mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid thob pa'ang med
K10D0176_H0177:340b-16: cing 'du shes kyi mdud pa med pa de ltar
K10D0176_H0177:340b-17: gang 'jug pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug

K10D0176_H0177:340b-27: gang 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin stong pa de la cung zad kyang rgal ba'ang med /
K10D0176_H0177:341a-6: mi 'gro ba'ang med pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:341a-7: byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa /

K10D0176_H0177:341a-10: 'khor ba'i ngo bo nyid mthong bas mi 'khor zhing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste /

K10D0176_H0177:341a-12: byang chub sems dpa' mngon sum mthong gis smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:341a-14: mi zad pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis so; ;zad pa ni shin tu zad pa ste /
K10D0176_H0177:341a-15: gang shin tu zad pa de la zad par bya
K10D0176_H0177:341a-16: ba ma yin pas na de'i phyir mi zad pa
K10D0176_H0177:341a-17: zhes bya'o // gang mi zad pa de ni skad cig pa ste /
K10D0176_H0177:341a-18: skad cig pa la zad pa med do //
K10D0176_H0177:341a-19: de lta bur rab tu zhugs pa de ni gnyis
K10D0176_H0177:341a-20: su med pa'i chos kyi sgor zhugs pa zhes bya'o
K10D0176_H0177:341a-21: // byang chub sems dpa' kun nas sbas kyis smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:341a-23: bdag med do zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te /
K10D0176_H0177:341a-24: gang bdag gi dngos po mi dmigs pa de ci
K10D0176_H0177:341a-25: zhig bdag med par byed par 'gyur ba de dag
K10D0176_H0177:341a-26: gi ngo bo nyid mthong bas gnyis su med pa
K10D0176_H0177:341a-27: ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:341a-28: byang chub sems dpa' glog gi lhas smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:341a-30: ma rig pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te /
K10D0176_H0177:341a-31: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ltar rig pa'ang de bzhin te /
K10D0176_H0177:341b-0: ma rig @341b ba gang yin pa de ni lung du ma bstan pa /
K10D0176_H0177:341b-3: gang 'di la mngon par rtogs pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:341b-4: byang chub sems dpa' mthong dags smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:341b-6: gzugs bshig pas stong pa ma yin gyi /
K10D0176_H0177:341b-7: gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste /
K10D0176_H0177:341b-8: de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:341b-11: rnam par sangs [?] pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis so //
K10D0176_H0177:341b-12: rnam par shes pa nyid ni stong pa nyid de /
K10D0176_H0177:341b-13: rnam par shes pa bshig pas stong pa ma yin gyi /
K10D0176_H0177:341b-14: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do //
K10D0176_H0177:341b-15: 'di la gang gis nye bar len pa'i phung po
K10D0176_H0177:341b-16: lnga la de bzhin du shes shing de lta bur
K10D0176_H0177:341b-17: ye shes kyis rig pa de ni gnyis su med
K10D0176_H0177:341b-18: par 'jug pa'o // byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi tog gis smras pa /

K10D0176_H0177:341b-20: khams bzhi bo ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
K10D0176_H0177:341b-21: sngon gyi mtha' yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
K10D0176_H0177:341b-22: phyi ma'i mtha' yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
K10D0176_H0177:341b-23: de bzhin du da ltar yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin te /
K10D0176_H0177:341b-24: gang de ltar khams la 'jug pa'i ye shes de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:341b-25: byang chub sems dpa' rab kyi blo gros kyis smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:341b-27: gzugs so zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te /
K10D0176_H0177:341b-28: gang mig yongs su shes pas gzugs la mi chags /
K10D0176_H0177:342a-1: sdang [?] mi rmongs pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0176_H0177:342a-2: de bzhin du rna ba dang sgra /
K10D0176_H0177:342a-6: yid dang chos de dag ni gnyis so //
K10D0176_H0177:342a-7: gang yang yid yongs su shes nas chos la mi chags /
K10D0176_H0177:342a-9: mi rmongs pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0176_H0177:342a-10: de ltar zhi ba la gnas pa ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:342a-11: byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas smras pa /

K10D0176_H0177:342a-13: sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:342a-14: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid ni yongs su bsngo ba'o //

K10D0176_H0177:342a-20: thams cad mkhyen pa ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
K10D0176_H0177:342a-21: yongs su bsngo ba'ang thams cad mkhyen pa'i rang bzhin te /
K10D0176_H0177:342a-22: gang tshul gcig pa 'di la 'jug pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:342a-23: byang chub sems dpa' blo zab kyis smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:342a-24: stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la mtshan ma med pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:342a-25: smon pa med pa'ang gzhan no zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te /
K10D0176_H0177:342a-26: stong pa gang yin pa de la mtshan ma gang yang med do //
K10D0176_H0177:342a-27: mtshan ma med pa la smon pa med /
K10D0176_H0177:342a-28: smon pa med pa la sems dang /
K10D0176_H0177:342a-30: rnam par shes pa rgyu ba med de /
K10D0176_H0177:342b-0: gang rnam par thar pa gcig @342b gi sgo de
K10D0176_H0177:342b-1: la rnam par thar pa thams cad kyi sgo rnams
K10D0176_H0177:342b-2: su blta bar bya ba de ni gnyis su med
K10D0176_H0177:342b-4: byang chub sems dpa' dbang po zhi bas smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:342b-7: dge 'dun zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te /
K10D0176_H0177:342b-8: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni chos so //
K10D0176_H0177:342b-9: chos kyi rang bzhin ni dge 'dun te /
K10D0176_H0177:342b-10: de dag thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:342b-12: chos thams cad kyi tshul ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te /
K10D0176_H0177:342b-13: gang de ltar rjes su 'gro ba de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:342b-14: byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i mig gis smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:342b-16: 'jig tshogs 'gog pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te /
K10D0176_H0177:342b-19: 'jig tshogs su lta ba mi skye ba med cing gang lta ba des 'jig tshogs so zhe'am /
K10D0176_H0177:342b-23: shin tu mi rtogs pas 'gog pa'i rang bzhin du

K10D0176_H0177:342b-26: byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dul bas smras pa /

K10D0176_H0177:342b-31: chos 'di dag ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid de /
K10D0176_H0177:342b-32: lus kyi mngon par 'du mi byed pa gang yin
K10D0176_H0177:342b-33: pa ngag gi mngon par 'du mi byed pa'ang de'i
K10D0176_H0177:343a-1: yid kyi mngon par 'du mi byed pa'ang de'i mtshan nyid de /

K10D0176_H0177:343a-14: bsod nams ma yin pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:343a-15: mi g-yo ba'i 'du byed rnams kyi rang gi mtshan
K10D0176_H0177:343a-16: nyid stong pa ste de la bsod nams kyang med
K10D0176_H0177:343a-17: / bsod nams ma yin pa'ang med /
K10D0176_H0177:343a-19: mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med de /

K10D0176_H0177:343a-23: bdag yongs su shes pa ni gnyis mi slong ngo //

K10D0176_H0177:343b-1: gang mi dmigs pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste /

K10D0176_H0177:343b-3: byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i bla mas smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:343b-5: snang ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te /
K10D0176_H0177:343b-7: snang ba'ang med pa de ni gnyis su med pa'o //

K10D0176_H0177:343b-13: byang chub sems dpa' lag na phyag rgya rin po ches smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:343b-14: mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' zhing
K10D0176_H0177:343b-15: 'khor ba la mi dga' ba de ni gnyis te
K10D0176_H0177:343b-16: / gang mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mngon par dga' ba med pa /
K10D0176_H0177:343b-17: 'khor ba la'ang mi dga' ba med pa de ni gnyis su med pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:343b-19: gang bcings pa las ni grol bar bstan gyi /
K10D0176_H0177:343b-20: gang shin tu ma bcings pa de thar pa ga la tshol /
K10D0176_H0177:343b-21: ma bcings ma grol ba'i dge slong gis ni dga' ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:343b-22: mi dga' ba'ang mi rnyed de /
K10D0176_H0177:343b-23: de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:343b-24: byang chub sems dpa' nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa /

K10D0176_H0177:344a-0: mi spyod pa la gnas pa ni lam gyi 'du shes @344a *//
K10D0176_H0177:344a-1: sam; lam ma yin pa'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0176_H0177:344a-2: 'du shes yongs su rig pa ni blo gnyis su mi 'jug ste /
K10D0176_H0177:344a-3: de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:344a-4: byang chub sems dpa' bden dags smras pa /
K10D0176_H0177:344a-6: rdzun pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te /
K10D0176_H0177:344a-7: bden pa mthong bas kyang bden pa nyid yang dag
K10D0176_H0177:344a-8: par rjes su mi mthong na rdzun pa lta ga
K10D0176_H0177:344a-9: la mthong / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10D0176_H0177:344a-10: sha'i mig gis mi mthong gi shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ste /
K10D0176_H0177:344a-11: ji ltar mi mthong na rnam par mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo //
K10D0176_H0177:344a-13: rnam par mthong ba'ang med pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:344a-14: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis rang
K10D0176_H0177:344a-15: rang gi bstan pa bshad nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
K10D0176_H0177:344a-16: gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0176_H0177:344a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i gnyis su med par 'jug pa gang yin /
K10D0176_H0177:344a-20: skyes bu dam pa khyed kun gyis kyang legs par
K10D0176_H0177:344a-21: smras mod kyi khyed kyis bshad pa de thams cad
K10D0176_H0177:344a-22: ni gnyis so // bstan pa gcig ni ma gtogs te brjod du med pa /
K10D0176_H0177:344a-26: bstan du med par gdags su med pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:344a-27: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas li tsa
K10D0176_H0177:344a-28: b'i dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad
K10D0176_H0177:344b-1: kho bo cag gis ni rang rang gi bstan pa
K10D0176_H0177:344b-2: bshad zin na rigs kyi bu khyod kyang gnyis su
K10D0176_H0177:344b-3: med pa'i chos kyi sgo bstan pa la spobs par
K10D0176_H0177:344b-4: gyis shig / de nas li tsa b'i dri ma
K10D0176_H0177:344b-5: med par grags pa cang mi smra bar gyur to
K10D0176_H0177:344b-6: gyis shig / // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
K10D0176_H0177:344b-7: gyur pas li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags
K10D0176_H0177:344b-8: pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10D0176_H0177:344b-12: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnyis su med par 'jug pa yin te /
K10D0176_H0177:344b-15: rnam par rig pa'i rgyu ba med do //
K10D0176_H0177:344b-16: bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0176_H0177:344b-17: lnga stong gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgor zhugs
K10D0176_H0177:344b-18: bas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
K10D0176_H0177:344b-19: gyur to // gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgor 'jug pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K10D0176_H0177:344b-20: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di snyam du bsams te /
K10D0176_H0177:344b-21: gdugs tshod la'ang bab na byang chub sems dpa' chen
K10D0176_H0177:344b-22: po 'di dag ni mi ldang na 'di dag zan
K10D0176_H0177:344b-24: de nas li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags
K10D0176_H0177:344b-25: pas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i sems kyi
K10D0176_H0177:344b-26: rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa
K10D0176_H0177:344b-27: sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0176_H0177:344b-29: de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par thar pa brgyad po
K10D0176_H0177:344b-30: gang dag gsungs pa'i rnam par thar pa de dag
K10D0176_H0177:344b-31: la gnas par gyis la zang zing dang 'dres pa'i
K10D0176_H0177:344b-32: rgyud kyis chos ma nyan cig /
K10D0176_H0177:345a-2: yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang /
K10D0176_H0177:345a-3: sngon ma myong ba'i kha zas za bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0176_H0177:345a-4: de nas de'i tshe li tsa b'i dri ma med
K10D0176_H0177:345a-5: par grags pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la
K10D0176_H0177:345a-7: 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas so //

K10D0176_H0177:354a-31: nges pa la zhugs pa gang gis zhal zas 'di

K10D0176_H0177:355b-10: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mi byed pa ni gang

K10D0176_H0177:355b-20: de ni yon tan rgya chen po bkod pa thams

K10D0176_H0177:355b-22: zhum pa'ang med / gong ba'ang med /
K10D0176_H0177:355b-23: yon tan rgya chen po bkod pa thams cad dang
K10D0176_H0177:355b-24: ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams la dga' ba'ang
K10D0176_H0177:355b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang rab tu ri mor skyed do //

K10D0176_H0177:356a-1: phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su ston pa de ni ngo mtshar to //
K10D0176_H0177:356a-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi yon tan gzhan dang /
K10D0176_H0177:356a-5: gzhan du sna tshogs su 'gyur yang bya lam gyis khebs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /

K10D0176_H0177:356a-9: dad du 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
K10D0176_H0177:356a-10: chags pa med pa'i ye shes ni tha dad pa
K10D0176_H0177:356a-11: ma yin no // kun dga' bo /
K10D0176_H0177:356a-12: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang /
K10D0176_H0177:356a-22: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:356a-25: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /
K10D0176_H0177:356a-34: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:356a-35: sems can rnam par grol ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:356a-36: zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:356a-37: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mtshungs te /
K10D0176_H0177:356a-38: de bas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K10D0176_H0177:356b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa @356b zhes bya'o //
K10D0176_H0177:356b-3: tshig de gsum gyi don rgyas pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:356b-4: tshig rnam par dbye ba gang yin pa de ni
K10D0176_H0177:356b-5: khyod tshe'i tshad bskal par 'dug kyang bde bar kun
K10D0176_H0177:356b-6: chub par sla ba ma yin no //
K10D0176_H0177:356b-7: stong gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kun dga' bo khyod 'dra bar mang du thos pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:356b-9: gzungs thob pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu gyur
K10D0176_H0177:356b-10: la; kun dga' bo dang 'dra ba'i sems can de
K10D0176_H0177:356b-11: dag thams cad kyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0176_H0177:356b-12: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:356b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:356b-14: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i tshig de gsum gyi don
K10D0176_H0177:356b-15: gdon mi za bar bstan pa ni bskal par yang
K10D0176_H0177:356b-16: kun chub par mi nus so //
K10D0176_H0177:356b-18: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni tshad med de /
K10D0176_H0177:356b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shes rab dang /
K10D0176_H0177:356b-20: spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10D0176_H0177:356b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0176_H0177:356b-23: deng slan chad bdag mang du thos pa'i mchog go zhes dam mi 'cha'o //
K10D0176_H0177:356b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0176_H0177:356b-26: khyod zhum pa'i sems ma skyed cig /
K10D0176_H0177:356b-27: de ci'i phyir zhe na; kun dga' bo /
K10D0176_H0177:356b-28: khyod nyan thos rnams la dgongs te mang du thos
K10D0176_H0177:356b-29: pa'i mchog go zhes ngas bstan gyi byang chub sems
K10D0176_H0177:356b-30: dpa'i nang na ma yin no //
K10D0176_H0177:357a-2: de dag ni mkhas pa dag gis tshod gzung bar bya ba ma yin te /
K10D0176_H0177:357a-4: rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gting ni tshod gzung bar
K10D0176_H0177:357a-5: nus kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab
K10D0176_H0177:357a-9: spobs pa'i gting ni tshod gzung mi nus so //
K10D0176_H0177:357a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams la khyod btang snyoms su gyis shig /
K10D0176_H0177:357a-14: li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa 'dis
K10D0176_H0177:357a-15: snga dro gcig la bkod pa bstan pa ni nyan
K10D0176_H0177:357a-16: thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob pa
K10D0176_H0177:357a-17: thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du'ang
K10D0176_H0177:357a-18: thos dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par sprul
K10D0176_H0177:357a-19: pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad kyis ston mi nus so
K10D0176_H0177:357a-20: thos dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / // de nas
K10D0176_H0177:357a-21: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs
K10D0176_H0177:357a-22: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas lhags pa'i byang chub
K10D0176_H0177:357a-23: sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar
K10D0176_H0177:357a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag btsal zhing tshig 'di
K10D0176_H0177:357a-28: bdag cag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
K10D0176_H0177:357a-29: la ngan par 'du shes bskyed pa yid la bgyis
K10D0176_H0177:357a-31: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10D0176_H0177:357b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul @357b dang /
K10D0176_H0177:357b-1: thabs mkhas pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K10D0176_H0177:357b-2: de dag sems can thams cad yongs su smin par
K10D0176_H0177:357b-3: bgyi ba'i slad du ji lta ji lta bur bzhed
K10D0176_H0177:357b-4: pa de ltar de lta bur zhing bkod pa ston
K10D0176_H0177:357b-6: bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi
K10D0176_H0177:357b-7: dri mchog der mchis kyang bcom ldan 'das rjes su
K10D0176_H0177:357b-8: dran par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rdzongs shig bdag cag
K10D0176_H0177:357b-10: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:357b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0176_H0177:357b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa zad pa pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:357b-14: mi zad pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K10D0176_H0177:357b-15: de la khyed kyis bslab par bya ste /
K10D0176_H0177:357b-17: zad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas so //
K10D0176_H0177:357b-18: mi zad pa ni 'dus ma byas te /
K10D0176_H0177:357b-19: de la byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas zad par mi bya /
K10D0176_H0177:357b-20: 'dus ma byas la'ang gnas par mi bya'o //
K10D0176_H0177:357b-21: de la 'dus byas mi zad pa ni /
K10D0176_H0177:357b-23: byams pa chen po las ma nyams pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:357b-24: snying rje chen po ma btang ba'o //
K10D0176_H0177:357b-25: lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par btsud pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi brjed pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:357b-26: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la mi skyo ba'o //
K10D0176_H0177:357b-27: bsdu ba'i dngos po mi gtong ba'o //
K10D0176_H0177:357b-28: dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir lus dang /
K10D0176_H0177:357b-30: dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la chog mi shes pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358a-0: yongs su bsngo bar mkhas pa la 'god @358a *//
K10D0176_H0177:358a-1: pa'o; ;chos tshol ba la le lo med pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358a-2: chos bstan pa la slob dpon dpe mkhyud mi byed pa'o /
K10D0176_H0177:358a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:358a-4: mchod pa'i dngos po la brtson pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358a-5: bsams bzhin du skye bas mi skrag pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358a-7: rgud pa dag la ma khengs mi 'dud pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358a-8: ma bslabs pa rnams la mi brnyas shing lobs pa rnams la ston pa ltar phangs par sems pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358a-9: nyon mongs pa rgyas pa rnams la tshul bzhin nye bar sbyor ba'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358a-10: dben pa la dga' zhing de la ma chags pa'o;
K10D0176_H0177:358a-11: ;bdag gi bde la ma zhen cing pha rol bde
K10D0176_H0177:358a-15: snyoms par 'jug pa la mnar med pa ltar 'du shes pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358a-16: 'khor ba la skyed mos tshal dang /
K10D0176_H0177:358a-17: mya ngan las 'das pa lta bur 'du shes pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358a-18: slong ba rnams la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358a-19: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la thams
K10D0176_H0177:358a-20: cad mkhyen pa nyid rdzogs par byed par 'du shes
K10D0176_H0177:358a-21: pa'o // tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la bskyab par 'du shes pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358a-22: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la ba mang 'du shes pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358a-23: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la bdag po g-yog tu 'du shes pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358a-24: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyis chog mi
K10D0176_H0177:358b-0: shes shing sangs rgyas kyi @358b zhing thams cad kyi
K10D0176_H0177:358b-1: yon tan bdag gi zhing du sgrub pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358b-3: dpe byad bzang po yongs su bkang ba'i phyir gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin yongs su gtong ba'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358b-4: sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas lus dang /
K10D0176_H0177:358b-8: ngag yongs su dag cing sems yongs su dag pas bskal pa grangs med par 'khor ba'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358b-9: sems dpa' bas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa thos kyang zhum par mi 'gyur ba'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358b-10: nyon mongs pa'i dgra tshar gcod par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi mtshon rnon po thogs pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358b-11: sems can thams cad kyi khur bkur ba'i phyir phung po dang /
K10D0176_H0177:358b-14: bdud kyi sde gzhom pa'i phyir brtson 'grus 'bar ba'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358b-15: nga rgyal med pa'i phyir ye shes tshol ba'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358b-16: chos gzung ba'i phyir 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358b-17: 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'o //

K10D0176_H0177:358b-19: bya ba thams cad yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa bskyed pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:358b-20: thos pa thams cad gzung ba'i phyir gzungs dang /
K10D0176_H0177:358b-23: sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad pa'i phyir dbang po mchog dang /
K10D0176_H0177:358b-24: mchog ma yin pa shes pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:359a-1: pa'i phyir byin gyi rlabs thogs pa med pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:359a-2: slobs pa thob pa rab tu rnyed pas spobs pa thogs pa med pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:359a-3: dge ba bcu'i las kyi la ma yongs su dag pas lha dang /
K10D0176_H0177:359a-4: mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong ba'o //
K10D0176_H0177:359a-5: tshad med pa bzhi rab tu bskyed pas tshangs pa'i lam du 'god pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:359a-6: chos bstan par gsol ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:359a-7: rjes su yi rang zhing legs so zhes bya ba
K10D0176_H0177:359a-8: byin pas sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs rab tu thob pa'o
K10D0176_H0177:359a-11: yid sdom pas khyad par du 'gro ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:359a-12: chos thams cad la ma chags pas sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam rab tu thob pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:359a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun sdud pas theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'dzud pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:359a-14: yon tan thams cad chud mi za bas bag yod pa yin te /
K10D0176_H0177:359a-16: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la brtson
K10D0176_H0177:359a-17: zhing byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas zad par mi
K10D0176_H0177:359a-18: byed do // ji ltar na 'dus ma byas la mi gnas she na /
K10D0176_H0177:359a-19: gang gi tshe stong pa nyid la byang bar byed cing stong pa nyid mngon sum du'ang mi byed /
K10D0176_H0177:359a-20: mtshan ma med pa la yongs su byang bar byed
K10D0176_H0177:359a-21: kyang mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du'ang mi byed
K10D0176_H0177:359a-22: / smon pa med pa la yongs su byang bar
K10D0176_H0177:359a-23: byed kyang smon pa med pa mngon sum du'ang mi
K10D0176_H0177:359a-24: / byed / mngon par 'du mi byed pa la
K10D0176_H0177:359b-0: yongs su byang bar @359b byed kyang mngon par 'du
K10D0176_H0177:359b-1: mi byed pa mngon sum du'ang mi byed /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-2: mi rtag par so sor rtog kyang dag pa'i rtsa bas chog mi shes /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-3: sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog kyang bsams bzhin du
K10D0176_H0177:359b-4: skye bdag med par so sor rtog kyang bdag yongs
K10D0176_H0177:359b-6: zhi bar so sor rtog kyang shin tu zhi ba'ang mi skyed /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-7: dben par so sor rtog kyang lus dang /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-9: gnas med par so sor rtog kyang dkar po'i chos kyis gnas spong ba'ang ma yin /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-10: 'byung ba med par so sor rtog kyang sems can rnams kyi khur blangs pa'ang thogs /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-11: zag pa med par so sor rtog kyang 'khor ba'i rgyun la slong bar yang byed /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-12: rgyu ba med par so sor rtog kyang sems can
K10D0176_H0177:359b-13: yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rgyu bar yang
K10D0176_H0177:359b-14: 'gyur / bdag med par so sor rtog kyang sems can la snying rje chen po mi 'dor /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-15: mi skye bar so sor rtog kyang nyan thos kyi nges par yang mi ltung /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-18: snying po med pa dang; bdag po med pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-19: gnas med par so sor rtog kyang bsod nams gsog ma yin pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-20: ye shes gsob ma yin pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-21: brnag pa yongs su rdzogs shing rang byung ba'i ye shes su dbang bskur ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-22: rang byung gi ye shes la brtson pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:359b-23: nges pa'i don sangs rgyas kyi rigs la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
K10D0176_H0177:360a-0: de ltar na de lta bu'i chos @360a *//
K10D0176_H0177:360a-1: la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dus ma
K10D0176_H0177:360a-2: byas la ma gnas shing 'dus byas kyang zad par
K10D0176_H0177:360a-3: mi byed do // rigs kyi bu /

K10D0176_H0177:360a-6: dag par sgrub pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi
K10D0176_H0177:360a-7: gnas so // ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par
K10D0176_H0177:360a-8: bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do
K10D0176_H0177:360a-9: gnas so // // byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //
K10D0176_H0177:360a-10: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do //
K10D0176_H0177:360a-11: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //
K10D0176_H0177:360a-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do //
K10D0176_H0177:360a-13: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //
K10D0176_H0177:360a-14: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par
K10D0176_H0177:360a-15: bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do
K10D0176_H0177:360a-16: // thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //
K10D0176_H0177:360a-17: shes rab kyis shin tu brtags pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do //
K10D0176_H0177:360a-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //
K10D0176_H0177:360a-19: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do //
K10D0176_H0177:360a-20: sems can gyi don myong ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-0: chos kyi @360b don yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags kyi phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-3: smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-4: smon pa med pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-5: bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-6: lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-7: mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtsen pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-8: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa
K10D0176_H0177:360b-9: drug gi phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do
K10D0176_H0177:360b-10: // pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs yongs su bkang ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-11: dus yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-12: chos kyi nor kun bsdu ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-13: nyi tshe ba'i chos mi 'dod pas 'dus byas zad par mi byed do //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-14: chos kyi sman kun sdud pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-15: ci rigs par chos kyi sman sbyor ba'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do //
K10D0176_H0177:360b-16: dam bcas pa la brtan pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so //

K10D0176_H0177:366b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra ba yongs su gzung
K10D0176_H0177:366b-6: bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs
K10D0176_H0177:366b-7: pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
K10D0176_H0177:366b-8: thams cad kyi rjes su bslab par bya'o //
K10D0176_H0177:366b-9: de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba bstan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /
K10D0176_H0177:366b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa bstan pas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di lha dang /
K10D0176_H0177:366b-11: mi'i skye dgu las khri phrag bcu bzhi bla na
K10D0176_H0177:366b-12: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
K10D0176_H0177:366b-13: sems skyes so // kun gyis kyang 'jig rten gyi
K10D0176_H0177:366b-14: khams mngon par dga' ba der skye bar smon lam
K10D0176_H0177:366b-15: btab ste; bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag thams
K10D0176_H0177:366b-16: cad 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' bar skye
K10D0176_H0177:366b-18: de ltar li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags
K10D0176_H0177:366b-19: pas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir sems can
K10D0176_H0177:366b-20: yongs su smin par bya ba ji snyed yod pa
K10D0176_H0177:366b-21: de dag thams cad smin par byas nas 'jig rten
K10D0176_H0177:366b-22: gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de slar gnas ji
K10D0176_H0177:366b-23: lta ba bzhin du bzhag go /
K10D0176_H0177:366b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
K10D0176_H0177:366b-25: sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to
K10D0176_H0177:367a-0: khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba @367a *//
K10D0176_H0177:367a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de mthong ngam /
K10D0176_H0177:367a-6: sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de 'dra bar gyur cig /
K10D0176_H0177:367a-7: sems can thams cad kyang rigs kyi bu li tsa
K10D0176_H0177:367a-8: b'i dri ma med par grags pa ji lta bu
K10D0176_H0177:367a-9: de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par gyur cig
K10D0176_H0177:367a-10: / bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa 'di lta
K10D0176_H0177:367a-11: bu mthong ba thob pa ni rnyed pa legs par
K10D0176_H0177:367a-12: / rnyed lags te / gang dag tha na da
K10D0176_H0177:367a-13: ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'am; yongs su mya ngan
K10D0176_H0177:367a-14: las 'das pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa'i
K10D0176_H0177:367a-15: sems can de dag kyang rnyed pa rab tu rnyed
K10D0176_H0177:367a-16: / rnyed lags te / par 'gyur na / gang dag thos nas mos pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:367a-21: kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:367a-25: sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su sbyor ba rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K10D0176_H0177:367a-26: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi sug par
K10D0176_H0177:367a-27: thob par gyur pa de dag kyang chos rin po
K10D0176_H0177:367a-28: che'i gter rnyed par 'gyur ro; ;gang dag chos kyi
K10D0176_H0177:367a-29: rnam grangs 'di kha ton du bgyid pa de dag
K10D0176_H0177:367a-30: kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i grogs su gyur pa lags
K10D0176_H0177:367a-31: so // gang dag chos 'di la mos pa rnams
K10D0176_H0177:367b-0: la rim gro @367b dang bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de
K10D0176_H0177:367b-1: dag ni chos yang dag par srung ba lags so
K10D0176_H0177:367b-2: so // // gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris te 'chang ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:367b-3: ri mor bgyid pa de dag gi khyim na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par 'gyur ro //
K10D0176_H0177:367b-4: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rjes su
K10D0176_H0177:367b-5: yi rang ba de dag ni bsod nams thams cad
K10D0176_H0177:367b-6: yongs su bsrung ba lags so //
K10D0176_H0177:367b-7: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na
K10D0176_H0177:367b-8: tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam dang
K10D0176_H0177:367b-9: / sdom pa'i tshig tsam yang gzhan dag la ston
K10D0176_H0177:367b-10: pa de dag ni chos kyi mchod sbyin chen po
K10D0176_H0177:367b-11: bgyid pa lags so; ;gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
K10D0176_H0177:367b-17: mos pa dag ni de nyid de dag la lung bstan pa lags so //
K10D0176_H0177:367b-18: 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba blangs pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:367b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K10D0176_H0177:367b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0176_H0177:367b-22: bdag gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:367b-23: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las chos kyi rnam
K10D0176_H0177:367b-24: grangs brgya stong mang po thos kyang ji ltar chos
K10D0176_H0177:367b-25: kyi rnam grangs 'di las rnam par sprul pa bsam
K10D0176_H0177:367b-26: gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul la 'jug pa rab tu
K10D0176_H0177:367b-27: bstan pa 'di lta bu ni sngon nam yang ma
K10D0176_H0177:368a-2: sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:368a-5: kun chub par bgyid pa de dag kyang the tshom
K10D0176_H0177:368a-6: ma mchis par 'di lta bu'i chos kyi snod du
K10D0176_H0177:368a-7: 'gyur na / gang dag bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la
K10D0176_H0177:368a-8: rjes su sbyor ba rnams la smos kyang ci 'tshal
K10D0176_H0177:368a-9: 'gyur na / te / de dag gis ngan song thams cad ni bcad /
K10D0176_H0177:368a-10: de dag gis bde 'gro'i lam thams cad ni phye /
K10D0176_H0177:368a-11: de dag sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni gzigs /
K10D0176_H0177:368a-12: de dag gis phas kyi rgol ba thams cad ni bcom /
K10D0176_H0177:368a-13: de dag gis bdud thams cad ni shin tu pham par bgyis /
K10D0176_H0177:368a-14: de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni rnam par sbyangs /
K10D0176_H0177:368a-15: de dag byang chub kyi snying po la ni gnas /
K10D0176_H0177:368a-16: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la ni yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ba lags so //
K10D0176_H0177:368a-18: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
K10D0176_H0177:368a-19: 'di 'chang ba de dag la bdag 'khor thams cad
K10D0176_H0177:368a-20: dang bcas pas rim gro dang /
K10D0176_H0177:368a-27: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:368a-29: rab tu ston pa der chos nyan pa'i slad du bdag g-yog dang bcas te mchi'o //
K10D0176_H0177:368b-0: rigs kyi @368b bu; ma dad pa rnams dad pa bskyed par bgyi /
K10D0176_H0177:368b-1: dad pa rnams ni chos dang ldan pas bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o //
K10D0176_H0177:368b-2: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:368b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0176_H0177:368b-7: khyod kyis legs par smras pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa'ang rjes su yi rang ngo //
K10D0176_H0177:368b-11: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
K10D0176_H0177:368b-12: kyi byang chub de ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
K10D0176_H0177:368b-13: las bstan to // lha'i dbang po /
K10D0176_H0177:368b-14: de bas na gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:368b-15: tha na glegs bam la 'dri ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:368b-18: kun chub par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10D0176_H0177:368b-19: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni 'das pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:368b-21: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mchod par 'gyur ro //
K10D0176_H0177:368b-24: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong
K10D0176_H0177:368b-25: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs
K10D0176_H0177:368b-29: bu ram shing gi tshal lam /
K10D0176_H0177:368b-31: smyig ma'i tshal lam til gyi zhing ngam /
K10D0176_H0177:368b-32: seng ldeng gi tshal bzhin du rab tu gang ba rnams la bskal pa'am /
K10D0176_H0177:368b-33: bskal pa las lhag par rim gror byas /
K10D0176_H0177:369a-1: gshegs pa de dag la mchod pa thams cad dang /
K10D0176_H0177:369a-2: bde ba'i yo byad kyis mchod pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:369a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan
K10D0176_H0177:369a-4: las 'das nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa re re
K10D0176_H0177:369a-5: la'ang mchod pa'i phyir gcig tu mkhregs pa ma zhig
K10D0176_H0177:369a-6: pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten rin po che thams
K10D0176_H0177:369a-7: cad las byas pa rgyar ni gling chen po bzhi
K10D0176_H0177:369a-9: 'phang du ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin pa /
K10D0176_H0177:369a-12: srog shing sgreng bas mdzes par rab tu byas te /
K10D0176_H0177:369a-13: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
K10D0176_H0177:369a-14: mchod rten so sor byas nas des de la bskal
K10D0176_H0177:369a-15: pa'am / bskal pa las lhag par me tog thams cad dang /
K10D0176_H0177:369a-18: ba dan thams cad kyis mchod pa byas shing rnga dang /
K10D0176_H0177:369a-19: sil snyan rnams brdungs te mchod na /
K10D0176_H0177:369a-23: rigs kyi bu mo de dag de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam /
K10D0176_H0177:369a-29: bskal pa bye ba brgya stong gis kyang bsod nams
K10D0176_H0177:369a-30: kyi phung po de'i mthar phyin par mi nus lags
K10D0176_H0177:369a-31: so // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0176_H0177:369b-0: khyod kyis khong du chud par @369b bya'o; ;gang rnam
K10D0176_H0177:369b-1: par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i
K10D0176_H0177:369b-4: kun chub par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu pho'am /
K10D0176_H0177:369b-5: rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams shin tu mang du bskyed do //
K10D0176_H0177:369b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni chos las byung ste /
K10D0176_H0177:369b-9: de chos kyi mchod par nus kyi zang zing gis ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0176_H0177:369b-11: khyed kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K10D0176_H0177:369b-13: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa /
K10D0176_H0177:369b-16: bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i dus de'i
K10D0176_H0177:369b-17: tshe na bskal pa rnam par sbyong ba la 'jig
K10D0176_H0177:369b-18: rten gyi khams cher bkod par de bzhin gshegs pa;
K10D0176_H0177:369b-19: dgra bcom pa / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10D0176_H0177:369b-24: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10D0176_H0177:369b-25: bla na med pa; lha dang /
K10D0176_H0177:369b-27: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10D0176_H0177:369b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0176_H0177:369b-29: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po de'i tshe'i
K10D0176_H0177:369b-30: tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gyur to
K10D0176_H0177:369b-31: // de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug yod do //
K10D0176_H0177:370a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni @370a *//
K10D0176_H0177:370a-1: bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod do //
K10D0176_H0177:370a-3: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal
K10D0176_H0177:370a-4: po rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba gling bzhi la
K10D0176_H0177:370a-5: dbang ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa
K10D0176_H0177:370a-6: zhig byung ste / de la bu dpa' ba /
K10D0176_H0177:370a-8: yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa /
K10D0176_H0177:370a-9: pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong du tshang ba yod do //
K10D0176_H0177:370a-10: rgyal po rin chen gdugs des bcom ldan 'das de
K10D0176_H0177:370a-11: bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas
K10D0176_H0177:370a-12: pa la bar gyi bskal pa lnga'i bar du bde
K10D0176_H0177:370a-13: ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis ri mor byas so
K10D0176_H0177:370a-15: bar gyi bskal pa lnga po de dag 'das nas
K10D0176_H0177:370a-16: rgyal po rin chen gdugs kyis bu stong la 'di
K10D0176_H0177:370a-18: kye khyed shes par gyis shig /
K10D0176_H0177:370a-19: ngas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas kyi /
K10D0176_H0177:370a-20: da khyed kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa gyis shig /
K10D0176_H0177:370a-21: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag pha rgyal
K10D0176_H0177:370a-22: po rin chen gdugs la legs so zhes smras nas
K10D0176_H0177:370a-23: de mnyan te / de dang lhan cig tshogs nas
K10D0176_H0177:370a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po la bskal
K10D0176_H0177:370a-25: pa bar ma lnga'i bar du bde ba'i yo byad
K10D0176_H0177:370a-26: thams cad kyis rim gror byas so //
K10D0176_H0177:370a-27: de'i nang nas rgyal bu zla gdugs zhes bya ba
K10D0176_H0177:370a-28: de gcig pu dben par song nas 'di snyam du
K10D0176_H0177:370b-0: sems te / mchod pa de bas mchod pa @370b
K10D0176_H0177:370b-1: gzhan ches khyad par du 'phags shing rgya che ba
K10D0176_H0177:370b-3: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bar snang de las lha dag 'di skad ces zer ro //
K10D0176_H0177:370b-5: chos kyi mchod pa ni mchod pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog go /
K10D0176_H0177:370b-7: chos kyi mchod pa de gang yin /
K10D0176_H0177:370b-10: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po de'i
K10D0176_H0177:370b-11: drung du song la chos kyi mchod pa de gang
K10D0176_H0177:370b-13: bcom ldan 'das de khyod la lung ston to //
K10D0176_H0177:370b-14: de nas lha'i dbang po rgyal bu zla gdugs gzhon
K10D0176_H0177:370b-15: nu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
K10D0176_H0177:370b-16: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi
K10D0176_H0177:370b-17: rgyal po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa
K10D0176_H0177:370b-18: dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10D0176_H0177:370b-19: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal bu zla gdugs kyis
K10D0176_H0177:370b-20: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal
K10D0176_H0177:370b-21: po de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0176_H0177:370b-22: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi mchod pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi mchod pa de gang lags /
K10D0176_H0177:370b-23: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K10D0176_H0177:370b-25: chos kyi mchod pa ni gang de bzhin gshegs pas
K10D0176_H0177:370b-26: gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo zab mor snang ba
K10D0176_H0177:370b-27: / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa /
K10D0176_H0177:370b-30: khong du chud pa dka' ba /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-1: pa; byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi nang du gtogs pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-3: mdo sde'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas btab pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-4: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ston pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-5: pha rol tu phyin pa drug las byung ba /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-6: 'dzin pa rnams yongs su bzung ba /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-7: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang ldan pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-8: byang chub kyi yan lag sgrub par gtogs pa; sems can la snying rje chen po 'jug pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-9: byams pa chen po ston pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-10: bdud kyi lta bar gyur pa thams cad med pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-11: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bstan pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-12: bdag med pa; sems can med pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-18: mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-20: ma byung ba dang ldan pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-21: byang chub kyi snying po sgrub pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-22: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-30: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyis rab tu bstod cing bsngags pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-31: dam pa'i chos kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-33: chos kyi mchod pa'i mchog la zhugs pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371a-34: 'phags pa'i skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba /
K10D0176_H0177:371b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yang dag par @371b ston pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371b-1: yang dag pa'i don gyi chos so sor yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371b-2: chos kyi mdo mi rtag pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:371b-5: zhi ba las nges par byung ba; ser sna can dang /
K10D0176_H0177:371b-13: dmigs pa la mngon par zhen pa thams cad spong bar byed pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371b-16: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba yang dag par
K10D0176_H0177:371b-17: ston pa de lta bu'i mdo sde rnams gang yang
K10D0176_H0177:371b-21: dam pa'i chos kun sdud pa de ni chos kyi mchod pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0176_H0177:371b-24: chos kyi mchod pa ni gang chos la chos su nges par sems pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371b-25: chos la chos bzhin nan tan byed pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371b-26: rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar mthun pa; mthar lta ba thams cad dang bral ba /
K10D0176_H0177:371b-28: 'byung ba med pa la bzod pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371b-37: don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa /
K10D0176_H0177:371b-38: ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la mi rton pa /
K10D0176_H0177:372a-1: don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi drang ba'i don kun rdzob la mngon par ma zhen pa /
K10D0176_H0177:372a-2: chos nyid la rton gyi gang zag tu lta ba
K10D0176_H0177:372a-3: dmigs par 'dzin pa la mngon par ma zhen pa
K10D0176_H0177:372a-4: / sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa /
K10D0176_H0177:372a-6: kun gzhi yang dag par 'joms pa /
K10D0176_H0177:372a-7: ma rig pa rnam par zhi ba nas /
K10D0176_H0177:372a-13: 'khrug pa'i bar du rnam par zhi zhing de ltar
K10D0176_H0177:372a-14: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis
K10D0176_H0177:372a-16: sems can la lta ba zad mi shes par mngon
K10D0176_H0177:372a-17: par sgrub pas mngon par sgrub cing lta ba rnams
K10D0176_H0177:372a-20: bla na med pa'i chos kyi mchod pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0176_H0177:372a-22: de ltar rgyal bu zla gdugs de bcom ldan 'das
K10D0176_H0177:372a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po de las
K10D0176_H0177:372a-24: chos kyi mchod pa de lta bu thos pa dang
K10D0176_H0177:372a-25: rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob bo
K10D0176_H0177:372a-27: rgyan ci thogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das de la phul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0176_H0177:372a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:372a-30: dam pa'i chos la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du
K10D0176_H0177:372b-0: bdag dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung @372b bar spro'o
K10D0176_H0177:372b-2: ji ltar bdag gis bdud dang /
K10D0176_H0177:372b-3: phyir rgol ba rnams bcom nas /
K10D0176_H0177:372b-5: dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de
K10D0176_H0177:372b-6: ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyi brlab par gsol
K10D0176_H0177:372b-7: / de bzhin gshegs pas de'i bsam pa mkhyen nas
K10D0176_H0177:372b-8: phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na dam pa'i chos
K10D0176_H0177:372b-9: kyi grong khyer skyong zhing srung ba dang /
K10D0176_H0177:372b-10: yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur bar lung bstan to //
K10D0176_H0177:372b-12: de nas rgyal bu zla gdugs de de bzhin gshegs
K10D0176_H0177:372b-13: pa de bzhugs bzhin du dad pas khyim nas khyim
K10D0176_H0177:372b-14: med par rab tu byung ste; dge ba'i chos la
K10D0176_H0177:372b-16: de brtson 'grus brtsams shing dge ba'i chos la rab
K10D0176_H0177:372b-17: tu gnas nas ring po ma lon par mngon par
K10D0176_H0177:372b-20: khong du chud par gyur to //
K10D0176_H0177:372b-21: de spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa thob pas bcom
K10D0176_H0177:372b-22: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po
K10D0176_H0177:372b-23: de yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang mngon par
K10D0176_H0177:372b-24: shes pa dang / gzungs kyi stobs kyis bcom ldan
K10D0176_H0177:372b-25: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po des
K10D0176_H0177:372b-26: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba bzhin du
K10D0176_H0177:372b-27: bar gyi bskal pa bcu'i bar du rjes su bskor
K10D0176_H0177:372b-28: shes pa dang / to // lha'i dbang po /
K10D0176_H0177:372b-29: de ltar dge slong zla gdugs dam pa'i chos yongs
K10D0176_H0177:372b-30: su gzung ba la mngon par brtson pas sems can
K10D0176_H0177:373a-0: @373a *// bye ba brgya phrag bcu ni bla na
K10D0176_H0177:373a-1: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
K10D0176_H0177:373a-2: phyir mi ldog par byas par gyur to //
K10D0176_H0177:373a-3: srog chags khrag khrig bzhi bcu ni nyan thos dang /
K10D0176_H0177:373a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la btul lo //
K10D0176_H0177:373a-5: sems can tshad med pa rnams ni mtho ris su skye bar byas so //
K10D0176_H0177:373a-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na rin chen gdugs zhes bya
K10D0176_H0177:373a-8: ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa de
K10D0176_H0177:373a-9: gzhan yin pa snyam du 'dzin na lha'i dbang po
K10D0176_H0177:373a-10: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o //
K10D0176_H0177:373a-12: rin chen 'od 'phro de bzhin gshegs pa de de'i
K10D0176_H0177:373a-13: tshe de'i dus na rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba'i
K10D0176_H0177:373a-14: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur to //
K10D0176_H0177:373a-15: rgyal po rin chen gdugs de'i bu stong yod pa
K10D0176_H0177:373a-16: de dag ni da ltar gyi bskal pa bzang po'i
K10D0176_H0177:373a-17: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag yin te /
K10D0176_H0177:373a-18: gang bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas stong tshang bar 'byung ba'o //
K10D0176_H0177:373a-19: de las bzhi ni sangs rgyas log pa dad sel la sogs pa sngon du byung ste /
K10D0176_H0177:373a-20: lhag ma rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0176_H0177:373a-21: 'khor ba 'jig la sogs pa snang mdzad la thug ba'i bar du ste /
K10D0176_H0177:373a-22: tha mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad ces bya ba 'byung ngo //
K10D0176_H0177:373a-24: de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
K10D0176_H0177:373b-0: gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal @373b po de'i dam pa'i
K10D0176_H0177:373b-1: chos yongs su bzung ba rgyal bu zla gdugs zhes
K10D0176_H0177:373b-2: bya ba de gzhan yin pa snyam du 'dzin na
K10D0176_H0177:373b-3: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o //
K10D0176_H0177:373b-6: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu zla gdugs zhes bya bar gyur te /
K10D0176_H0177:373b-8: rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K10D0176_H0177:373b-10: ji tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod
K10D0176_H0177:373b-11: pa'i nang na chos kyi mchod pa ni mchog ces
K10D0176_H0177:373b-17: bla na med pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0176_H0177:373b-18: lha'i dbang po; de lta bas na nga la zang
K10D0176_H0177:373b-19: zing gis ma mchod par chos kyi mchod pas mchod
K10D0176_H0177:373b-20: cig / nga la zang zing gis bsti stang ma byed /
K10D0176_H0177:373b-21: chos kyi bsti stang gis ri mor gyis shig /
K10D0176_H0177:373b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0176_H0177:373b-23: sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa
K10D0176_H0177:373b-25: ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0176_H0177:373b-26: byang chub bskal pa bye ba grangs med par yang
K10D0176_H0177:373b-27: dag par bsgrubs pa 'di khyod la gtad do //
K10D0176_H0177:373b-28: ci nas phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe chos kyi
K10D0176_H0177:373b-29: rnam grangs 'di lta bu khyod kyi byin gyi rlabs
K10D0176_H0177:373b-30: kyis yongs su bzung bas dzambu'i gling du rgyas par
K10D0176_H0177:373b-31: 'gyur zhing / ma nub par gyis shig /
K10D0176_H0177:373b-34: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rigs kyi bu pho'am /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-3: lha ma yin dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0176_H0177:374a-5: chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag chos
K10D0176_H0177:374a-6: kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos pas nyams par gyur
K10D0176_H0177:374a-7: ta re / 'di lta bu'i mdo sde thos nas
K10D0176_H0177:374a-8: shin tu dga' zhing dad ba rnyed par 'gyur ba
K10D0176_H0177:374a-9: ta re / dang / spyi bos len par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-10: rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsrung ba'i phyir /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-12: khyod kyis de'i dus na mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di rgyas bar gyis shig /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di gnyis te /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-17: tshig 'bru sna tshogs la dad pa'i phyag rgya dang /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-18: chos kyi tshul zab mos mi skrag cing /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-19: yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-21: de gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
K10D0176_H0177:374a-23: de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag tshig dang /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-24: tshig 'bru sna tshogs la dad cing lhur len pa de dag ni las dang po pa yin te /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-25: tshangs par spyad nas ring po ma lon par rig par bya'o //
K10D0176_H0177:374a-27: gang dag mdo sde zab mo ma gos pa phrugs pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-28: snrel zhi'i rgyud kyi tshig dang /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-29: rim pa rab tu dbye ba 'di 'don pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:374a-32: ston par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ni
K10D0176_H0177:374b-0: ring du tshangs par @374b spyod par rig par bya'o
K10D0176_H0177:374b-2: de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyu gnyis kyis bdag la rma 'byin te /
K10D0176_H0177:374b-3: chos zab mo la nges par sems par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0176_H0177:374b-5: sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde zab mo thos na
K10D0176_H0177:374b-6: skrag cing the tshom du gyur nas rjes su yi
K10D0176_H0177:374b-8: 'di lta bur bdag cag gis sngon ma thos na de gang nas 'ongs zhes spong bar byed do //
K10D0176_H0177:374b-10: gang dag mdo sde zab mo 'dzin pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:374b-11: chos zab mo'i snod du gyur pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:374b-12: chos zab mo ston pa de dag la mi sten /
K10D0176_H0177:374b-15: de dag la bsti stang mi byed par gyur te /
K10D0176_H0177:374b-16: bar bar du de dag la mi snyan par yang brjod do //
K10D0176_H0177:374b-17: rgyu de gnyis kyis las dang po pa'i byang chub
K10D0176_H0177:374b-18: sems dpa' bdag nyid la rma 'byin te chos zab
K10D0176_H0177:374b-19: mo la nges par mi rtog pa'o //
K10D0176_H0177:374b-20: rgyu gnyis kyis zab mo la mi mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid la rma 'byin te /
K10D0176_H0177:374b-21: ma skyes pa'i chos la'ang bzod pa thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0176_H0177:374b-23: las dang po pa spyad nas ring po ma lon
K10D0176_H0177:374b-24: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas shing khyad
K10D0176_H0177:374b-25: du gsod pa de 'dzin du mi 'jug /
K10D0176_H0177:374b-28: gang zab mo la shin tu ma dad pas bslab
K10D0176_H0177:374b-29: pa la ri mo mi byed cing 'jig rten gyi
K10D0176_H0177:374b-30: zang zing sbyin pas ni sems can la phan 'dogs
K10D0176_H0177:375a-0: @375a *// shing chos kyi sbyin pas ma yin te /
K10D0176_H0177:375a-2: zab mo la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgyu 'di gnyis kyis bdag nyid la rma 'byin te /
K10D0176_H0177:375a-3: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'ang myur du thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0176_H0177:375a-4: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:375a-5: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0176_H0177:375a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du legs par gsungs pa ni /
K10D0176_H0177:375a-12: bdag gis da slan chad nongs pa 'di dag spang bar bgyi'o //
K10D0176_H0177:375a-13: de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag
K10D0176_H0177:375a-14: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal ba bye ba khrag
K10D0176_H0177:375a-15: khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa nas yang dag
K10D0176_H0177:375a-16: par bsgrubs pa 'di bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10D0176_H0177:375a-18: ma 'ongs pa'i rigs kyi bu pho dang /
K10D0176_H0177:375a-19: rigs kyi bu mo snod du gyur pa de dag
K10D0176_H0177:375a-20: la mdo sde 'di lta bu lag tu son par
K10D0176_H0177:375a-21: bgyi'o // dran pa gang gis 'di 'dra ba'i mdo sde 'di lta bu la mos pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:375a-24: kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:375a-26: yi ger 'dri ba dang; gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher
K10D0176_H0177:375a-27: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dran pa nye bar bsgrub par
K10D0176_H0177:375a-29: bdag gis de dag brtan par bgyi'o //
K10D0176_H0177:375b-0: bcom ldan 'das @375b de'i dus na 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di la mos pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:375b-1: rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni /
K10D0176_H0177:375b-3: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyis rlabs lags par rig bar bgyi'o //
K10D0176_H0177:375b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0176_H0177:375b-5: byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas
K10D0176_H0177:375b-8: khyod kyi tshig de ni legs par smras te /
K10D0176_H0177:375b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang khyod kyis legs par smras pa
K10D0176_H0177:375b-10: de la rjes su yi rang ba gnang bar mdzad
K10D0176_H0177:375b-11: do // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag
K10D0176_H0177:375b-12: gis dbyangs gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so;
K10D0176_H0177:375b-13: do // ;bcom ldan 'das / bdag cag kyang de
K10D0176_H0177:375b-14: bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas
K10D0176_H0177:375b-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas mchis te /
K10D0176_H0177:375b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di rgyas par bgyi'o //
K10D0176_H0177:375b-17: rigs kyi bu de dag kyang mos par bgyi'o //
K10D0176_H0177:375b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0176_H0177:375b-24: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang /
K10D0176_H0177:375b-25: gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu spyod pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:375b-27: yang dag par ston pa de dang /
K10D0176_H0177:375b-28: de dag tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi'ang dpung dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:375b-29: bzhon pa dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas te /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-2: chos smra ba de'i dpag tshad khor yug tu ci
K10D0176_H0177:376a-3: nas kyang chos smra ba de la glags lta ba
K10D0176_H0177:376a-4: dang / klan ka tshol ba gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed bar bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10D0176_H0177:376a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
K10D0176_H0177:376a-6: kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to
K10D0176_H0177:376a-8: khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-10: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston cig /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-12: bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba lags na /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-14: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-18: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dri ma med par grangs pas bstan pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-19: phrugs su sbyar ba snrel zhir mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-20: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa'i le'u zhes kyang bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-24: li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-25: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-26: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-27: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-28: nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K10D0176_H0177:376a-29: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K10D0176_H0177:376b-0: @376b dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10D0176_H0177:376b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0176_H0177:376b-3: dam pa'i chos gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K10D0176_H0177:376b-4: 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa
K10D0176_H0177:376b-5: zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so
K10D0176_H0177:376b-6: //// shloo ka stong brgyad brgya ste bam po drug go /
